Address: 5400 LYNDON B. JOHNSON FREEWAY SUITE 1300, DALLAS, Texas, 75240, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Capital Southwest Corporation, which we refer to as "we," "our," "us," "CSWC," or the "Company" is an internally managed closed-end, non-diversified investment company that has elected to be regulated as a business development company, or BDC, under the Investment Company Act of 1940, as amended, or the 1940 Act. We specialize in providing customized financing to middle market companies in a broad range of industry segments located primarily in the United States. Our common stock currently trades on The Nasdaq Global Select Market under the ticker symbol "CSWC." We were organized as a Texas corporation on April 19, 1961. Until September 1969, we operated as a small business investment company, or SBIC, licensed under the Small Business Investment Act of 1958. At that time, we transferred to our wholly-owned subsidiary, Capital Southwest Venture Corporation, or CSVC, certain assets including our SBIC license.  ... More ...
